document.full_text: wes welker's verbal jabs at rex ryan in january came as a surprise to many. but welker and ryan had been engaging in good-natured trash-talking for years.
document.title: rex ryan and wes welker had history of trading barbs
lines_and_colors: wes welker's verbal jabs at rex ryan in january came as a surprise to many. but welker and ryan had been engaging in good-natured trash-talking for years.
